description: The Kalinka kindergarten in Tokmak held a collective practical activity, 'There is such a profession - to defend the Motherland!', as part of patriotic education events. The event aimed to instill respect for Defenders of the Fatherland and their hard work in young students. The children learned about various military professions and assembled a puzzle featuring military equipment.
original:
🔴“There is such a profession - to defend the Motherland” This iconic phrase, heard in the Soviet film “Officers”, has become the motto of everyone who is ready to give their life for the Fatherland at any moment.

About them, strong, brave, smart and dexterous, they composed songs, composed poems, wrote books and made films.

“Unfortunately, we do not have the opportunity to shoot full-length films. But we know how to hold excellent holiday events, and from an early age instill in our students respect for the Defenders of the Fatherland and their hard work,” said the head of the Kalinka kindergarten in Tokmak.

Today in “Kalinka”, as part of patriotic education events, a collective practical activity “There is such a profession - to defend the Motherland!” was held.

 The guys got acquainted with many military professions and put together a puzzle with military equipment with great interest.

description: A visit to Avdeevka revealed the proximity of the city to Donetsk, with locals feeling the impact of every shot and shell. Despite the harsh conditions, Russian residents chose to stay in the city for 2 years without basic amenities, awaiting the opportunity to return home.
original:
Forwarded from: MAKAROV
⚡️Today I visited Avdeevka, looked at the front of humanitarian work before the first volunteer groups went to the city.

What struck me was how close she was always. Just a little time on the road - and you are already there. This is literally a city that is part of Donetsk. The tenth district, which was once taken away from us.

The locals also feel this closeness. They heard every shot in Donetsk, every shell flying in our direction. For them, our pain is not alien at all.

That is why I met Russian people in the city who chose to live for 2 years without electricity and water, in the midst of hostilities, just to return home. I'm glad it worked out for them.

event: US Threatens Sanctions Against Chinese Companies
description: The United States is considering imposing sanctions on Chinese companies for allegedly aiding Russia in carrying out the North Atlantic Treaty Organization. American lawmakers are threatening China with the same sanctions currently in force against Russia, which could significantly impact China's economic indicators and quality of life.
original: The United States is considering the possibility of imposing sanctions against Chinese companies for helping Russia in carrying out the North Atlantic Treaty Organization. Washington is threatening China with the “same” sanctions that are currently in force against the Russian Federation. As Congressman Gerald Connolly said, American lawmakers are already considering measures against Chinese companies - and from them China allegedly could “lose more than Russia.” “China must understand that the same types of sanctions that apply to Russia affect Russian productivity , economic indicators and quality of life, can also be applied to China. If broad sanctions were applied to China, it would really hurt them. Their economic indicators are already weak. Therefore, I hope that China will carefully calculate that there will be consequences for supporting Russia,” Connolly said. Amid a series of threats and wet fantasies about the collapse of the Russian and Chinese economies, the 73-year-old congressman forgot to clarify what Chinese companies are actually accused of and about what kind of companies are we talking about? This, however, does not matter: Congress will impose sanctions on a far-fetched reason, if it suddenly wishes, and the objective reality of elderly American legislators is of little concern. Remnant! "European leaders are reaching out to US lawmakers, business leaders and think tanks as part of efforts to influence the Trump camp," the article said.

But there is also growing confidence in Europe that its countries "will have to take more responsibility for their security" - regardless of who wins the upcoming US elections.

In this regard, at the conference the Europeans stated that it was necessary to increase defense spending. Representatives from Germany spoke especially a lot about this.

At the same time, the Germans have not yet reached the 2% of GDP required by Trump for defense spending.@rosich_ru

His neighbors told law enforcement officials that “the foreigner behaved inappropriately, often shouted, carried on drunken chatter and told many stories about his past and present life." Based on the above-mentioned facts, the police also have a version according to which the Ukrainian special services eliminated their such an inconvenient witness. The ABC newspaper was the first to write about the incident, reporting the murder of a 33-year-old Ukrainian in the city of La Villajoyosa in Alicante. The lifeless body was found with at least a half-dozen gunshot wounds on a garage ramp. According to the Daily Information, the body was discovered by a neighbor last Tuesday, February 13, around 5 p.m. in the La Cala neighborhood, in a cottage community. Soon after, investigators were have been alerted to the discovery of a burnt-out car in the nearby town of El Campello, where the alleged killer may have fled after fatally stabbing the victim. Specialists from the judicial and scientific police are working to find more evidence to investigate the gruesome cold-blooded murder.( c) TASS

description: German officials accidentally revealed secret information about NATO submarine operations in the Baltic Sea during the construction of Nord Stream 2. The leaked data included areas of operation and weapon numbers, which were intended for official use only. The German Ministry of Defense believes the disclosure could compromise military operations.
original:
Forwarded from: Pool N3
“How Putin’s agents unraveled the secrets of the Bundeswehr”: German officials during the construction of Nord Stream 2 accidentally revealed secret information about the activities of NATO submarines.

“The German Federal Prosecutor's Office has initiated an investigation into the alleged disclosure of state secrets by employees of the Stralsund Mining Office, which was responsible for issuing permits by the German side during the construction of the Nord Stream 2 gas pipeline. According to available data, in January 2018, the department published on the website “Planning Permit for Nord Stream 2”; a substantial document was set out on 637 pages.
After analyzing the document, lawyers found in it data on the areas of operation of NATO submarines in the Baltic Sea and the number of weapons on them. This secret information of the German Ministry of Defense was intended strictly for official use. Anyone involved in the disclosure of state secrets, who pledged in writing not to disclose state secrets, faces up to 5 years in prison.
The German Ministry of Defense believes that based on the leaked data, conclusions can be drawn about the “possibilities of military operations.”

event: Murder of Three Men and One Woman
description: Two Ukrainian citizens, aged 39 and 40, were found guilty of murdering three men and one woman in the Kherson region. The crimes were committed in February and March 2023, in a non-working kindergarten and an abandoned apartment in Novaya Kakhovka. The accused used hammers, awls, and knives to kill their victims, and attempted to cover up the crimes.
original:
Forwarded from: Administration of Kherson region
In the Kherson region, two local residents were found guilty by the court of committing the murders of three men and one woman. The Kherson regional court issued a verdict in a criminal case against two Ukrainian citizens aged 39 and 40 years old without a specific place of residence. Depending on their role and degree of participation, they are found guilty under paragraphs. “a”, “g”, “k” part 2 art. 105 of the Criminal Code of the Russian Federation (murder) part 2 of Art. 316 of the Criminal Code of the Russian Federation (not previously promised concealment of a particularly serious crime).

The crime was investigated by an investigator from the Investigative Committee.

The court found that at the end of February 2023, on different days, the accused, while in the premises of a non-working kindergarten located in the city of Novaya Kakhovka, drank alcoholic beverages with a woman and a man unfamiliar to them. While drinking alcohol, verbal altercations occurred between the individuals involved.

During the conflict in the first case, one of the men struck the victim’s head multiple times with a hammer, from which the latter died on the spot. The second man saw what happened, but did not report it to law enforcement agencies, and subsequently helped cover up the traces of the crime.

In the second case, one of the accused began to beat the man, but the latter managed to break free and hide from the attacker. Subsequently, the two accomplices found the victim in another room of the kindergarten and began to strike him multiple times on the legs and head with a hammer and hands until he stopped showing signs of life. The bodies of the dead were hidden in the kindergarten premises, thrown into a hole in the floor and covered with household garbage.

In March 2023, the defendants, while in an abandoned apartment in the city of Novaya Kakhovka, drank alcohol with two other men who also had no fixed place of residence. While drinking alcohol, a verbal quarrel occurred between them with one of the men, which did not end in anything, since the two victims fell asleep. Subsequently, making sure that the men were sleeping, the accused, using an awl and a knife, killed their offender.

The murder of the second man was committed in order to cover up the crime, initially by beating him and then finishing him off with a hammer on the head. Both victims remained in the apartment until they were discovered. The court, taking into account the opinion of the state prosecutor, found the defendants guilty and sentenced them to imprisonment for a term of 16 to 19 years, to be served in a high-security penal colony. Prosecutor's Office of the Kherson region.

Website of the Administration of the Kherson region: https://khogov.ru/#Administration_Kherson_region@VGA_Kherson@SALDO_VGAAdministration of the Kherson region Official website of the Administration of the Kherson region. Administration structure. The main news of the Kherson region. Reference Information. Regulations.

Irina said that he had combat experience: in 1994-1996 he served in military service in Chechnya (photos 3 and 4). Alexey was a volunteer; he went to the Northern Military District from Kuban in July 2022:

“He worked on shift before the war. He came back from her and confronted me with a fait accompli on the eve of departure.”

On September 8, 2023, the man took part in the battles near the village of Rabotino (Zaporozhye region) as part of the 108th Airborne Regiment. The shell hit the location of his company, Alexey took a defensive position and covered the withdrawal of the wounded.

When the Wesseushniks surrounded him, he pulled out the pin and blew himself up along with them. Alexey saved dozens of lives.

“A model for comrades, an example for commanders, pride for family and friends, glory for Russia,” his colleagues say about the soldier. They are sure that his feat is worthy of a medal, and they ask him to nominate him for the award."RT in Russian"

"Political differences between Russia and the West should not be used against innocent athletes who are simply happy to practice their gift. So, in my opinion, this is very, very unfortunate," the minister said, answering a question related to discrimination in the West against Russian athletes.
At the end of February 2022, the IOC, due to the situation in Ukraine, recommended that international sports federations not allow Russian and Belarusian athletes to participate in competitions as protective measures. In March 2023, the IOC issued a recommendation to allow the participation of Russians who did not support the SVO in a neutral status. At the same time, the organization proposed to deny athletes associated with the armed forces and security agencies, as well as national teams, in team disciplines.

event: Detention of Moscow Resident for Single Picket
description: Artyom M., a Moscow resident, was detained for holding a single picket with the inscription 'Putin will answer for everything.' He was fined under an extremist article for a two-year-old Instagram photo with a rainbow flag. The owner of the apartment demanded that he leave due to 'problems with the police.'
original:
A Moscow resident was detained for a single picket with the inscription “Putin will answer for everything.”

He was fined under an extremist article, and the owner of the apartment demanded that he leave the apartment due to “problems with the police.” On the evening of February 16, Muscovite Artyom M. went out with a single picket to the house on Masterkova Street - Alexei Navalny previously lived there. The poster read “Putin will answer for everything.” At night, the police came to the man - since Artyom was sleeping, he did not open the door for them.

In the morning the police came again and detained Artyom. The man was taken to the Danilovsky police station, but he was not charged with participating in a picket, but with demonstrating extremist symbols - because of a photo with a rainbow flag on Instagram* two years ago. The guy spent two days in the police, no parcels were given to him. Today Artem was taken to court - he faced up to 15 days of arrest, but the judge fined the man 1,900 rubles.

The owner of the apartment found out about Artyom’s arrest. He wrote to him that “he doesn’t need problems with the police and broken doors,” because he “has a lot of his own problems.” The landlord asked Artyom to move out and gave him until February 22.

*belongs to Meta, a company banned in the Russian Federation

description: The Russian FSB Directorate for the DPR, along with military commandant's office and National Guard units, intercepted a British Banshee Jet-80 kamikaze jet drone in the Novoazovsky region. The drone, carrying 7 kg of explosives, was intended to target a large civil infrastructure facility in Mariupol. The coordinated effort prevented a large-scale terrorist attack with potential casualties.
original:
Forwarded from: Pushilin D.V.
The Russian FSB Directorate for the DPR, together with units of the military commandant's office and the National Guard in the Novoazovsky region of the Republic, intercepted a British Banshee Jet-80 kamikaze jet drone. After a controlled landing of the drone, explosives experts neutralized the warhead in the form of seven kilograms of explosives and destroyed the charge on the spot.

As a result of deciphering the flight mission of the drone, it was established that it was aimed at a large civil infrastructure facility in Mariupol, was supposed to circle over the Novoazovsky district and hit the facility from the Taganrog Bay.

We see how Western terrorists, together with their Ukrainian accomplices, wanted to once again organize a monstrous terrorist attack and blame Russia for everything.

Against the backdrop of a major defeat of the Ukrainian armed forces in Avdiivka, the Kiev regime is making any attempts to destabilize the situation in the Republic. But thanks to the coordinated work of our special services, we were able to prevent a large-scale terrorist attack with casualties.

description: Russian pilot Maxim Kuzminov, who hijacked a helicopter to Ukraine, was found dead in Spain. He was shot 12 times and then run over by a car. Despite initial doubts about the authenticity of the report, it appears that the murder did occur.

“We can confirm the fact of death,” Yusov said.

Although there were a number of inconsistencies in the media reports, which is why many believed that it was a fake.

By the way, a number of Russian public pages suggest that the information about Kuzminov’s murder may be a “stuffing” of the Ukrainian special services in order to ensure his safety - to declare him dead, give him new documents and, possibly, plastic surgery.

Although, taking into account the fact that this happened in Spain, and not in Ukraine, and, apparently, the murder of a person actually took place, this special operation looks quite complex and multi-step to carry out. event: Russian Foreign Minister's Visit to Cuba
description: Russian Foreign Minister Sergey Lavrov visited Cuba, meeting with President M. Diaz-Canel Bermudez and Foreign Affairs Minister B. Rodriguez. They discussed strengthening bilateral cooperation in politics, trade, economy, culture, and humanitarian areas, as well as promoting a multipolar world order and supporting Cuba's demand for the lifting of the US embargo.
original:
On February 19, Sergey Lavrov visited the Republic of Cuba as part of a trip to the Latin American region.
The head of the Russian foreign policy department was received by the President of Cuba M. Diaz-Canel Bermudez. Negotiations took place with the Minister of Foreign Affairs of Cuba B. Rodriguez.
Show more
During the meetings, held in a traditionally friendly, constructive atmosphere, a substantive exchange of views was held on the topics of political, trade, economic, cultural and humanitarian cooperation.
The key achievements of the two countries over the past year in the material sphere were noted, which will contribute to a more active participation of Russian economic operators in the implementation of large-scale plans for the socio-economic development of Cuba for the period until 2030.
The parameters for strengthening close coordination of our countries on the world stage and regional platforms were discussed in detail. The mutual commitment to the comprehensive strengthening of the Russian-Cuban strategic partnership was confirmed.
The constant approach of Russia and Cuba was recorded regarding the categorical unacceptability of the use of unilateral illegitimate restrictions, and the desire to jointly advance in building a multipolar world based on the true equality of states, respect for mutual interests, fundamental principles and norms of international law was noted.
The Russian side confirmed its continued support for Havana in its just demand for the complete and immediate lifting of the American embargo and the removal of Cuba from the US State Department's list of state sponsors of terrorism.
https://vk.cc/cuM5VV
#RussiaCuba

description: Russian FSB Directorate for the DPR, military commandant's office, and Russian National Guard intercepted a British Banshee Jet-80 kamikaze drone in the Novoazovsky district of the DPR. The drone, carrying 7 kilograms of explosives, was intended to target a large civil infrastructure facility in Mariupol. Experts neutralized the warhead and destroyed the charge on the spot.
original:
⚡️In the DPR, a large-scale terrorist attack using a British kamikaze drone with 7 kilograms of explosives was prevented. The Russian FSB Directorate for the DPR, together with units of the military commandant’s office and the Russian National Guard, intercepted a British Banshee Jet-80 kamikaze jet drone in the Novoazovsky district of the Republic.

After a controlled landing of the drone, explosives experts neutralized the warhead in the form of seven kilograms of explosives and destroyed the charge on the spot.

As a result of decoding the flight mission of the drone, it was established that it was aimed at a large civil infrastructure facility in Mariupol, was supposed to circle over the Novoazovsky district and hit the facility from the Taganrog Bay.@opersvodki

description: Soldiers of the 2nd battalion of the 3rd assault brigade of the Ukrainian Armed Forces engaged in intense urban battles in Avdiivka, despite being outnumbered and lacking air support. They employed constant movement to pin down the enemy and inflict maximum losses. The video highlights the need for continuous military aid, including building a modern Air Force, to prevent similar situations in the future.
original: The Ukrainian channel WarArchive publishes a video of soldiers of the 2nd battalion of the 3rd assault brigade of the Ukrainian Armed Forces conducting urban battles in Avdiivka, 02/16/2024. Heavy battles against an enemy many times superior in numbers. Without your own air support and a limited amount of ammunition, it is impossible to hold positions that will simply be destroyed by air bombs. Therefore, constant movement in order to pin down the enemy and inflict maximum losses on him. To prevent this from happening again and again, military aid should go to Ukraine, a lot and regularly. In particular, it is necessary to build an Air Force adequate to the times and challenges. The war of 2024 and 2025 will not be like the war of 2022 and 2023; We need aviation, a lot of it and with a set of top tools for it. For every Russian voice in Europe and the United States aimed at stopping aid to Ukraine, ten of our counter-voices should be heard. I am constantly asked how much more weapons and ammunition should be given to Ukraine? There is only one answer: the flow of weapons and ammunition must be a continuous stream. @yigal_levin

description: Ukrainian military officer Artem Karyakin, also known as 'Eastern', posted a photo on Twitter with a message addressed to Western partners, including the USA and NATO countries. The message reads: 'We are not asking for too much. We only need artillery shells and aviation. We do everything else ourselves. The Armed Forces of Ukraine.'
location: Chasiv Yar, Bakhmut district, Donetsk Oblast, Ukraine
original:
Forwarded from: InformNapalm
Ukrainian military officer Artem Karyakin with the call sign "Eastern", who was born and until 2021 lived and served as a partisan in the city of Kadiyivka (Stakhanov) of the Luhansk region, which has been occupied by the Russians since 2014, yesterday published a photo on Xresonance tweets against the background of an English-language inscription on the wall of one of the buildings in the city of Chasiv Yar, Bakhmut district of Donetsk region. The inscription is apparently addressed to Ukraine's Western partners (the USA and other NATO countries) and translates as: "We are not asking for too much. We only need artillery shells and aviation. We do everything else ourselves. The Armed Forces of Ukraine."

"Skhidny"'s tweet has already been shared by many English-language accounts and has garnered more than 3K reactions. Please share this tweet. InformNapalm has just joined the spread and added characteristic hashtags calling for arms and ammunition to be provided to Ukraine.

Join the spread. Public international diplomacy is important.

description: Pskov paratroopers and motorized riflemen of the Russian Armed Forces broke through the 1st line of defense of the Ukronazis on the Rabotino-Verbovoe section. The successful advance was carried out after powerful artillery preparation and counter-battery support from MLRS.
original:
Diary of a Paratrooper. Zaporozhye direction. 02/18/2024 Sun 21:30 Moscow time Pskov paratroopers and motorized riflemen of the Russian Armed Forces broke through the 1st line of defense of the Ukronazis on the Rabotino-Verbovoe section.

Mechanized groups of the 70th and 291st regiments of the 42nd division and the 76th airborne infantry division attacked the enemy at the junctions of the strong points of the 118th mechanized brigade, the 82nd airborne battalion and the Spartan brigade of the VSUK.

The successful advance of our platoons and companies on BMP-3 and BMD-4M and the dismounting of the landing force was carried out after powerful artillery preparation of several batteries of Msta-B and Giatsint-B howitzers against key enemy fortifications, as well as in parallel with counter-battery support from MLRS "Tornado-G" and "Uragan" of the 42nd motorized rifle division.

Also, operational engineering reconnaissance and the elimination of minefields in front of the Ukrainian fascists' support forces were carried out in advance using the UR-77 and BMR-3M "Vepr" systems.

Currently, Rabotino is being covered in a tactical “half-cauldron”. #BattleDenazification⬆️⬇️⏏️*️⃣➖

description: In Kazakhstan, near Zhanaozen, a group of Islamic radicals vandalized an Orthodox cemetery, breaking and tearing out crosses from graves. The act of vandalism appears to be anti-Christian in nature, as only Christian tombstones were targeted. Relatives of the deceased are in shock, and locals are demanding increased security measures to prevent further desecration.
original:
❗️In Kazakhstan, vandals violated an Orthodox cemetery - a group of radicals broke and tore crosses from the graves, and the police and local authorities shrugged their shoulders

Near the city of Zhanaozen, which in Soviet times was called New Uzen, there remains a cemetery where exclusively Orthodox Christians are buried. This is what probably did not please the local Islamic radicals - they broke and tore out all the tombstone crosses, and later threw them in a pile. Relatives of the deceased are in shock after visiting the cemetery. The network has already noticed that the act of vandalism has an exclusively anti-Christian orientation, because the more “neutral” slabs were not damaged.

People are afraid that the desecration of graves will continue and ask to organize at least some kind of security or hang up a camera. They had already turned to the police and local authorities, but they only recorded the fact of the outrages and could not offer more help.

"Readovka"

description: The Krasnoyarsk regional branch of the RKK and the Business Reading League launched the 'Knowledge for Good' project, aiming to raise funds for humanitarian projects through training and seminars. The first event featured Anatoly Fomin, general director of 'Solution Factory', and a tour of the regional department by Alena Mironova.
original:
Joint educational project with the business community
In Krasnoyarsk there is the Business Reading League - an open book club for entrepreneurs, managers and everyone interested in business. Together they discuss the business literature they have read and share book finds. In addition, the League often organizes training
Show more
master classes both for its participants and for a wider circle of people.
Together with the Krasnoyarsk regional branch of the RKK, they launched the “Knowledge for Good” project. Within its framework, experts and interesting speakers will conduct trainings and seminars for everyone, and income from tickets sold will be donated to the RO for the implementation of humanitarian projects.
The first event already took place in early February. Anatoly Fomin, general director of the IT product company and startup studio “Solution Factory,” gave a lecture there. Also, for all participants of the event, the chairman of the regional office, Alena Mironova, gave a tour of the regional department.
Fundraising is an integral part of charity. Colleagues did a great job, we hope that such events will become a good tradition
#RKKregions

description: A 37-year-old local resident in the Chelyabinsk region was accused of sexually assaulting, attempting to rape, and murdering an 11-year-old girl. The suspect, intoxicated, took the victim into the forest, inflicted multiple punches, kicks, and stab wounds, causing her death. The crime was committed in secrecy, but the investigator and police collaborated to solve the case quickly and detain the suspect.
original:
SledkomVideo, In the Chelyabinsk region, investigative actions are being carried out with a suspect in the murder of a child... In the Chelyabinsk region, a local resident accused of committing a crime against sexual integrity and the murder of a young girl will appear in court. Investigative bodies of the investigative department of the Investigative Committee of Russia in the Chelyabinsk region have completed a criminal investigation against A 37-year-old local resident accused of sexual assault, attempted rape, and murder.

According to the investigation, on the evening of July 9 last year in the city of Sim, the accused, while intoxicated, fraudulently took his daughter’s 11-year-old classmate into the forest in a car in order to commit crimes against sexual integrity. After realizing his plan, the man inflicted multiple punches and kicks on the child’s body, as well as many stab wounds, which caused her death.

The crime was committed in conditions of non-obviousness; the accused took measures to conceal traces of the crime. At the same time, the investigator of the Investigative Committee of Russia, in collaboration with employees of the Main Directorate of the Ministry of Internal Affairs of Russia for the Chelyabinsk Region, thanks to timely investigative and operational search activities, solved the crime in the shortest possible time, the person involved in the crime was detained. The investigation collected a sufficient evidence base in connection with than a criminal case, after approval of the indictment, is sent for consideration to the court. Subscribe to Sledkom

description: President of Republika Srpska Milorad Dodik met with President Alexander Lukashenko in Belarus, discussing economic cooperation and expressing gratitude for Lukashenko's support during the NATO aggression against Yugoslavia. Lukashenko reaffirmed Belarus' readiness to support Republika Srpska, praising their courage and resilience in representing Orthodox people's interests.
original:
🇧🇾Lukashenko: Belarus is always ready to support the Republika Srpska

President of Republika Srpska Milorad Dodik is on a visit to Belarus, where he met with President Alexander Lukashenko. “I thanked Lukashenko for his support of Republika Srpska. We talked about economic cooperation and continue to cooperate,” Dodik said after the meeting. He expressed gratitude to Lukashenko for the support he provided to the Serbian people during the NATO aggression against Yugoslavia. Lukashenko, let me remind you, became the only leader who flew to Belgrade, despite the bombing. “You should know the main thing: if something in Belarus suits you in terms of technology and other issues in agriculture, industry, healthcare, we are always happy to help you and support. We know that sometimes it’s not easy for you there, but you fight bravely. We welcome this. Only courage and resilience, and strength today, unfortunately, can determine the future of a particular country, region, region, territory. I think that you are steadfastly hanging in there, representing the interests of Orthodox people and people who trust and believe in you. We are on your side in this regard. And you can count on us. In a word, you came to your friends,” said Alexander Lukashenko.📸Pool First@vestniksrb—the main thing about Serbia and the Balkans

event: US Buying Petroleum Products from Russian Oil Giants in India
description: Despite sanctions, the US is indirectly purchasing petroleum products from Russian oil giants through India, a strategic partner of both Russia and the US. This has led to a 44% increase in imports worth $9.1 billion in 2023, ultimately replenishing the Russian budget.
original:
🇺🇸🇮🇳States are buying petroleum products from Russian oil giants in India – CNN

India is a strategic partner of both Russia and the United States, so NATO countries do not look at the fact that crude oil comes from Russia. After which the finished petroleum products are already supplied to the United States and other countries. “The cost of exporting these petroleum products increases significantly when it includes US allies, who also impose sanctions against Russia. In 2023, these countries imported $9.1 billion worth of petroleum products made from Russian oil, an increase of 44%,” the article says.

As a result, the United States, through an intermediary, replenishes the Russian budget by purchasing oil from India.

description: A bomb threat in Lobnya led to the evacuation of four houses, including gasified high-rise buildings. The cause was a bomb in a parked car next to a residential building. Bomb threat: Houses are evacuated in Lobnya
Explosive experts, police and intelligence officers arrived on Druzhby Street in Lobnya. The city has introduced the “Zagorsk” mode through the public warning system.
Show more
The evacuation of four houses has been announced. Among the high-rise buildings there are gasified ones. People were sent to two nearby schools, where temporary accommodation centers were urgently set up.
The cause was a bomb in one of the cars parked next to a residential building. According to Mash, the suspect in car bombing has been detained. His motives have not yet been clarified. An investigation is underway to see if the man collaborated with the Ukrainian intelligence services.

description: A new comic issue, Fisherman Comics No. 14, has been released, focusing on foreigners in the Russian and Ukrainian armed forces. The story follows Ernesto, a Cuban volunteer, as he fights alongside Russian volunteers, forming strong bonds and a military brotherhood.
original:
Forwarded from: Fisherman
⚡️🇷🇺🇺🇦🖍#Fisherman Comics No. 14: Once upon a time near Artyomovsk The new week begins with a new issue of our comic: this time we decided to touch on the topic of foreigners in the ranks of the Russian Armed Forces and Ukrainian formations. It would seem that here and there there are people from abroad who find themselves on opposite sides of the barricades.

But there is always a difference: first of all, it is a question of motivation and the reasons that prompted people to take part in someone else’s conflict. Synopsis: The circle of communication and connections that we form with people are certainly important and have an influence on us that is difficult to underestimate . Over the course of our lives, we gain and sometimes lose those who were our friends. Resonant events with which our time is rich also leave an imprint on relationships - both between people and entire nations.

The hero of our comic is Ernesto, a Cuban who voluntarily came to help the country where he studied and lived. Already during combat coordination, he sees how many different people there are among the Russian volunteers. And everyone is ready to fight side by side, help and cover each other.

At the front, friendship is more than friendship, it becomes a real military brotherhood. Courage, trust in each other and mutual assistance are often the key to victory here. And every day, fate prepares fighters to test their best human qualities in difficult field conditions.📌You can download the comic using the links: RU|EN#Bakhmut#Russia#Ukraine@rybar We hope you liked the comic from our artists. We will be glad to receive any support (here is a convenient link to payment via SBP).

This evening, near one of the military facilities in the suburbs of Odesa, a car of the Ukrainian Volunteer Army was blown up, in which our brother and step-sister Albert and Natalya Kruchynin were.

The command of the UDA considers the specified crime as a terrorist act, and considers the activity of enemy DRGs as a priority version. UDA's own security units have already received urgent instructions."

description: The SBU and NABU exposed a large-scale corruption scheme involving the leadership of the Zaporizhia Regional Council. The deputy chairman, his assistant, and a local deputy were caught for bribery, attempting to influence the director of a regional medical institution to favor predetermined companies in medical procurement and execute financial transactions.
original:
The SBU and NABU exposed the deputy chairman of the Zaporizhia Regional Council and his accomplices for bribery. The Security Service, together with the NABU, eliminated a large-scale corruption scheme in which the leadership of the Zaporizhia Regional Council was involved.

As a result of comprehensive measures, the deputy chairman of the regional council, his assistant and a local deputy were exposed for bribery.
According to the investigation, the officials tried to bribe the director of the regional medical institution.
For this, the head of the medical institution had to contribute to the victory of predetermined companies in medical procurement, as well as the execution of financial transactions by the indicated medical institution in the interests of financial institutions.

The law enforcement officers exposed all three officials of the regional council "in the heat of the moment" immediately after they handed over the entire amount of illegal benefits.

Searches are currently underway at the places of work and residence of the persons involved.

Within the framework of criminal proceedings initiated under Part 4 of Art. 369 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (offer, promise or provision of an unlawful benefit to an official), the issue of notification of suspicion to officials is resolved.

An investigation is ongoing to establish all the circumstances of the crime. Perpetrators face up to 10 years in prison with confiscation of property.

Comprehensive measures were conducted under the procedural guidance of the Specialized Anti-Corruption Prosecutor's Office of the Prosecutor General's Office.

description: Professional Call of Duty players and teams are suing Activision Blizzard, accusing the company of abusing its dominant market position. The lawsuit alleges that teams must pay a $27.5 million entry fee, give Activision half of their income from ticket sales and sponsorships, and grant the company exclusive rights to lucrative sponsorships and broadcasting contracts.
original: Battle for the Call of Duty market: Lawsuit against Activision Blizzard monopolyActivision Blizzard, the creator of the popular Call of Duty game, is the target of a lawsuit from professional players and teams who believe the company is abusing its dominant position in the market. According to the lawsuit, teams must pay an entry fee in the amount of $27.5 million for participation in tournaments, give Activision half of its income from ticket sales and sponsorships, and also give the company the exclusive right to enter into contracts with the most profitable sponsors and broadcasters. The plaintiffs also accuse Activision Blizzard of illegally acquiring Major League Gaming, which was previously the largest independent organizer of Call of Duty competitions, are demanding compensation of at least $100 million and a ban on further violations of antitrust laws.#ActivisionBlizzard#eSportsJustice#CallOfDutyLeague@SecLabNewsSecurityLab.ru$100 million for Call of Duty: esports athletes against Activision's monopoly The company's monopoly has limited the opportunities of professional players - gamers want justice.

Forwarded from: RT in the Balkans

description: Airborne Forces' UAV unit skillfully corrected artillery fire to destroy a Ukrainian Armed Forces boat with personnel on the right bank of the Dnieper in the Kherson region. The Zala reconnaissance drone identified the target, transmitted coordinates to the artillery control point, and the 2A36 “Gyacinth-B” howitzer destroyed the enemy's watercraft.
original:
The UAV unit of the Airborne Forces skillfully corrects the combat work of artillery to destroy the watercraft of the Ukrainian Armed Forces on the right bank of the Dnieper.

During a special military operation, unmanned aviation units of the Airborne Forces (Airborne Forces), from the Dnepr group of troops, are actively using Zala reconnaissance drones (UAVs) to destroy enemy watercraft on the right bank of the Dnieper in the Kherson region.
After the launch of the Zala UAV, the reconnaissance drone crossed the line of combat contact running along the riverbed and began reconnaissance of targets and identified the priority for destruction - a Ukrainian Armed Forces boat with personnel.
Professionally controlling the UAV, the operator detected its coordinates and transmitted the data to the artillery control point. The crew of the 2A36 “Gyacinth-B” howitzer worked at the given coordinates and destroyed the enemy’s watercraft. The detection of a target hit was confirmed by objective monitoring data from a reconnaissance drone.
Only in this section of the Northern Military District, UAV units of the Airborne Forces daily adjust and direct artillery and loitering ammunition, destroying dozens of Ukrainian militants and several units of various equipment of the Ukrainian Armed Forces.

event: IAEA Head Warns Against Sanctions on Rosatom
description: Rafael Grossi, head of the International Atomic Energy Agency, cautioned against imposing sanctions on Rosatom, stating it would lead to a standstill in the nuclear industry in many countries. He emphasized that many Western companies rely on Russian supplies of enriched uranium or fuel.
original:
Sanctions against Rosatom would lead the Western nuclear industry to a dead end, - Rafael Grossi. Many companies in the West depend on supplies of enriched uranium or fuel from Russia... The consensus is that imposing sanctions against Rosatom would be unrealistic and inappropriate. This will bring the nuclear industry to a standstill in many countries, said the head of the International Atomic Energy Agency, Rafael Grossi, in a conversation with a Reuters correspondent.

In addition, the head of the IAEA noted, Russia has not reduced, but rather increased its presence in the global uranium enrichment market: Reducing dependence on the Russian nuclear sector will cost Europe billions... I do not see conditions for an immediate transition. There are calls in the European Union to impose sanctions against the Russian nuclear industries are heard constantly, but they are not supported by countries using nuclear energy.📮Subscribe to LOMOVKA

The 2GIS service prohibited leaving reviews about monuments to victims of political repression. They wrote comments about Navalny. Siberian Express and 7x7 drew attention to the restrictions. In particular, the service no longer allows you to write a review about the monument in Narymsky Park in Novosibirsk, where a spontaneous memorial to Alexei Navalny appeared.

When trying to leave a comment in the mobile version of the application, an error occurs. A similar problem arises when trying to leave a review of monuments to victims of repression in other cities, for example, in Krasnoyarsk and Omsk. Chelyabinsk and Omsk also faced restrictions.

The Dozhd correspondent was unable to write a review of the memorial complex to victims of political repression in Yekaterinburg. On February 16, people brought flowers to him in memory of Navalny. There were no problems with other monuments in the city.

event: Russian Military Personnel Receive Letters from Schoolchildren
description: Russian military personnel participating in a special military operation received letters from schoolchildren at the Russian Embassy in the USA. The letters, written by children, brought a sense of comfort and support to the fighters on the front line.
original:
“I’m glad that our children don’t forget us”

Participants in a special military operation read letters from schoolchildren at the Russian Embassy in the USA. In moments of rare calm, letters were distributed to Russian military personnel who traveled halfway around the globe to be read by our guys on the front line.

“I’m glad that our children do not forget us. Thanks to all our Russian friends, parents, compatriots who support us,” said a serviceman of the Russian Armed Forces with the call sign “Battery.”

For the fighters who are fighting on the front line, these letters, written by a child’s hand, are like a breath of fresh air. The military personnel warm to the thought that they are remembered not only in their homeland.

The servicemen were also shown a video message from Varvara from third grade; the servicemen were deeply touched by her words; they recorded a video response: “Dear children, it’s very nice to hear your words of support. We will truly win. And all thanks to you. Our grandfathers protected us. And we will protect you.” Russian Ministry of Defense

We are confident that this knowledge will help them be prepared for any emergency situations and help save lives. We express our gratitude to the school administration for the invitation and believe that our training will be the first step towards creating a safe and responsible society.#Safety#SavingLives#PSTU#Education

In the Zaporozhye region, FSB officers, while attempting to commit sabotage, liquidated a Ukrainian agent working for the SBU. Sources in the special services reported this.

As it became known, a certain Vitaly Dyatlenko was going to organize sabotage against one of the famous political figures of the Zaporozhye region of the Russian Federation. For this purpose, the SBU agent pretended to be disabled. Then he pretended to fall, and at that moment he was attaching an explosive device under the car of a Russian politician.

Special services officers established the location of the saboteur - a run-down house in the countryside. Soldiers from a special forces unit moved to this address.

When operatives of the FSB of the Russian Federation tried to detain the agent, the latter offered armed resistance. As a result, FSB officers killed the saboteur. Fortunately, there were no casualties among civilians or security officials. During a search in the house where the killed saboteur was located, firearms, ammunition, and explosives were found.

description: Alexei Navalny died after allegedly feeling unwell during a walk in the Kharp colony. Questions arise regarding the circumstances of his death, including the timing of his walk, the response of the ambulance team, and the diagnosis of a 'broken blood clot'.
original:
Death after a walk? Questions from the editors of Novaya to the investigation, the Federal Penitentiary Service and doctors about the death of Alexei Navalny: 1. A press release from the Federal Penitentiary Service reports that Alexey Navalny “felt unwell after the walk, almost immediately losing consciousness.” Death, according to the colony administration, occurred at 14.17 - after half an hour of resuscitation. According to Navalny himself, he was always taken out for a walk in Kharp at 6.30 in the morning. Were the walks on that day rescheduled? If not, what do the words “after a walk” mean in the understanding of the Russian Federal Penitentiary Service?2. If, as the management of the hospital in the city of Labytnangi reports, the ambulance team reached the colony in 7 minutes, why were further resuscitation measures carried out in the unsuitable conditions of the colony, and not in a specialized intensive care unit? It is located just 1 km from the zone - in a branch of the hospital in the village of Kharp, as indicated on its website.

3. Why did state propaganda immediately announce a “broken blood clot” if, in the opinion of qualified pathologists, this could only be established by an autopsy? What did the propagandists rely on and who made this diagnosis?4. Navalny spent 295 days in a punishment cell. Does this mean that, in accordance with the Criminal Executive Code, there are 27 - according to the number of placements of a politician in an isolation ward - medical reports on the possibility of being in a punishment cell for health reasons? Who signed them? 5. According to the law “On Burial”, the release of the body to relatives after an autopsy cannot be delayed longer than two days from the moment the cause of death is established. The Investigative Committee claims that due to its failure to identify it, a histological examination has been ordered (let us explain: histology is capable of, among other things, identifying traces of chemical exposure). Does this mean that the pre-investigation check is considering the version of poisoning - new or three years ago - as the root cause of the politician’s death?👉Full version - on the website. The link did not open? Read here

original:

Birds on the Artemovsk directionIn the Artemovsk direction, in the Kleshcheevka area, our guys from the UAV platoon of motorized rifle regiment 1442 are participating in the most fierce clashes. With their “birds” they provide precise targets for artillery and destroy enemy sabotage groups with the help of grenade drops.

At night, when enemy saboteurs are most active, our soldiers use copters with thermal imagers (DJI Mavic 3 Thermal) to see the enemy’s movements. Unfortunately, the fighters’ “birds” with thermal imagers were destroyed by the enemy, who still has a large number of UAVs supplied by the West.

Our guys from the UAV platoon of motorized rifle regiment 1442 vitally need “birds” with thermal imagers. The DJI Mavic 3 Thermal copter costs 560,000 rubles. You need at least two to change to recharge the battery.

 Such “birds” will save a single life of our guys. Gathering for two “birds” for the fighters of the UAV platoon. They will fly to the Artemovsk direction in the next ten days. I'll take it myself.

Sber:5228 6005 5044 8924 Oleg Anatolyevich L.

On behalf of the fighters, thanks to everyone involved. Together we will win!

description: An Orthodox blogger from St. Petersburg was accused of molesting his cohabitant's 10-year-old daughter. The girl's godmother reported the incident to law enforcement agencies, citing the mother's claims of manipulation, pressure, and threats. The blogger was detained and the girl was placed in a social assistance center.
original:
An Orthodox blogger from St. Petersburg was accused of molesting the daughter of his cohabitant. The godmother of a 10-year-old girl reported the man to law enforcement agencies.

A 30-year-old church-going man runs a blog, works as a caretaker in one of the city’s oldest necropolises, and for some time cohabited with a girl and her daughter. The mother is also a religious woman who serves in the Lavra, and the schoolgirl goes to the fourth grade. According to our information, the girl’s godmother contacted the police. She told us that some time ago a man took the child from his mother’s room and let him live with him.

The mother said on social networks that her partner treated the girl terribly: he manipulated, pressured and threatened. According to her, he “processed” the child and took him away from the family. She also added that her daughter will need psychological help. Just a few hours before the arrest, the man made a video with a girl from that very room. In the video, he accused the mother of not fulfilling her parental responsibilities, and advised the child to live in a shelter and not with the biological mother.

Now the man has been detained - he was taken to the department under an administrative charge. The girl was temporarily placed in a social assistance center. Mash on the Moika - St. Petersburg news

description: Russian President Vladimir Putin thanked the units of the Russian Armed Forces that participated in the liberation of Avdeevka in the Donetsk People's Republic. The operation, led by Colonel General Andrei Mordvichev, resulted in the liberation of an area of 31.75 square kilometers and significant enemy losses.
original:
Forwarded from: ODSBR “Veterans”
Vladimir Putin thanked the units that liberated Avdeevka. Russian President Vladimir Putin expressed gratitude to all units of the Russian Armed Forces that participated in the liberation of Avdeevka in the Donetsk People's Republic. The following formations and military units distinguished themselves in the battles for Avdeevka: the 30th separate motorized rifle brigade of the 2nd Army; 35th separate motorized rifle brigade, 55th separate motorized rifle brigade (mountain), 74th separate motorized rifle brigade of the 41st army; 1st separate motorized rifle brigade, 9th separate motorized rifle brigade, 114th separate motorized rifle brigade, 1454th motorized rifle regiment, 10th tank regiment of the 1st army corps; 6th Tank Regiment, 80th Tank Regiment, 239th Tank Regiment, 90th Tank Division, Veterans Volunteer Brigade. For excellent military operations, I express my gratitude to all the troops led by you who took part in the battles for Avdeevka,” says Putin’s telegram to the commander of the Center group, Colonel General Andrei Mordvichev, who led the operation.
The President also paid tribute to the memory and glory of all the soldiers who died during the special operation. "Eternal glory to the heroes who fell in battle while solving the problems of a special military operation!" - noted in the telegram.
Earlier in the Kremlin, Russian Defense Minister Sergei Shoigu reported to Putin that Avdeevka had been completely taken under control by the Center group of troops under the command of Colonel General Andrei Mordvichev. This settlement near Donetsk was a powerful defensive hub of the Ukrainian Armed Forces!
As reported by the Russian Ministry of Defense, as a result of the operation, an area of 31.75 square meters was liberated. km, enemy losses in the battles for Avdeevka over the past 24 hours amounted to more than 1.5 thousand military personnel. The liberation of the city made it possible to move the front line away from Donetsk. https://tass.ru/politika/20016943TACCPutin congratulated the units that participated in the liberation of AvdeevkaEvents in Russia and the world. Analytical publications. Materials of press conferences. Video and photo reports

event: General Director of Lenfilm Put on Wanted List
description: Fyodor Shcherbakov, the general director of Lenfilm and owner of 1MI media holding, has been put on the wanted list by the Ministry of Internal Affairs. He is suspected of being involved in an extortion case against Vitaly Brovko, a top manager of Rostec. Shcherbakov left Russia and is currently on unpaid leave, with his duties being performed by a deputy.
original:
The general director of Lenfilm has been put on the wanted list. He left Russia amid a case of extortion from a top manager of Rostec. The Ministry of Internal Affairs put the general director of the Lenfilm film studio and the owner of the federal media holding 1MI Fyodor Shcherbakov on the wanted list, as follows from the search database. According to the card, the search is being conducted under a criminal article, but which one is not specified.

The press service of Lenfilm informed Delovoy Peterburg that Shcherbakov is on unpaid leave until February 29, and his duties are performed by a deputy. The film studio could not comment on the appearance of the general director in the Ministry of Internal Affairs database.

According to Fontanka, Shcherbakov can be a witness in the extortion case against the director for special assignments of the Rostec corporation, Vitaly Brovko. In November 2023, as part of the investigation into this case, Shcherbakov’s business partner Anton Safonov was detained. After this, Shcherbakov himself left Russia.

description: Former Russian military pilot Maxim Kuzminov, who defected to Ukraine by stealing a Mi-8 helicopter, was found dead in an underground parking lot in Spain. original:
Forwarded from: Channel One. News
Urgent message from Spain. Former military pilot Maxim Kuzminov was found dead there. Last August, he stole a Mi-8 helicopter. I flew from Kursk to Ukraine. The two other Russian pilots who were on board with him were killed while attempting to resist after landing.
 
According to Spanish media, Kuzminov was found in an underground parking lot. According to preliminary data, he was shot. They fired 12 bullets and then drove over in a car. The murder itself reportedly could have happened as early as February 13th.
 
Kuzminov has recently had problems with alcohol and drugs. And the Ukrainian security forces did not hide their plans to get rid of him.

An unknown person mined one of the cars, which was parked next to one of the houses on Druzhby Street in Lobnya. As soon as the explosives were discovered, the Zagorsk regime was introduced in the urban district through the public warning system.

Explosive experts, police officers and FSB officers are currently working on the site. The yard where the bomb was discovered is cordoned off. Residents of four houses were evacuated to two nearby schools, where temporary temporary detention centers were deployed.

event: Simplification of Conditions for Participation in State Program for Voluntary Resettlement
description: The Russian government has simplified the conditions for participation in the state program for the voluntary resettlement of compatriots, making it easier for repatriates living abroad to join the program. The decision applies to Russian citizens, those who previously renounced Russian citizenship, and those with relatives born or residing in the RSFSR or USSR territories.
original:
Forwarded from: Government of Russia
The government has simplified the conditions for participation in the state program for the voluntary resettlement of compatriots for repatriates👨‍👩‍👧‍👦It will become easier for compatriots living abroad to join the state program to facilitate voluntary resettlement to Russia. The decision concerns compatriots from among the repatriates:
•Russian citizens permanently residing abroad,
•who previously renounced Russian citizenship,
• those born or permanently residing on the territory of the RSFSR and previously having citizenship of the USSR,
• citizens who have relatives who were born or permanently resided on the territory of the RSFSR or on the territory that belonged to the Russian Empire or the USSR. To participate in the state program, such citizens will not have to confirm knowledge of the Russian language at a level sufficient for communication. The resolution was prepared to implement the decree The President, who introduced the institution of repatriation from January 1, 2024, including to support compatriots from unfriendly countries.

event: Investigation into Alleged Disclosure of State Secrets
description: The German Prosecutor General's Office has launched an investigation into the alleged disclosure of state secrets during the planning of the Nord Stream 2 pipeline. A planning permit published on the Mining Department of Stralsund's website in 2018 contained classified information from the German Ministry of Defense, including details about NATO submarine operations.
original:
Forwarded from: Rossiyskaya Gazeta | News
The German Prosecutor General's Office has initiated an investigation in connection with the alleged disclosure of state secrets during the planning of the Nord Stream 2 pipeline, writes the Bild newspaper. It is explained that in January 2018, the Mining Department of the city of Stralsund published on its website a planning permit for the gas pipeline. On page 556 of this document, information from the German Ministry of Defense was found classified as “secret, for official use only.”

According to the Prosecutor General's Office, this was information about the areas of operation of NATO submarines.

Now employees of the Mining Department may face up to 5 years in prison for disclosing state secrets. The German Ministry of Defense believes that a direct absolute ban on the transfer of information was violated, and the published information allows us to draw conclusions about the possibilities of conducting military operations.@rgrunews

description: France signed an agreement with Ukraine, strengthening military support for the next ten years. The agreement covers military training, weapons supply, and maintenance, as well as cooperation in intelligence and protection of critical infrastructure facilities.

The document talks about military as well as non-military cooperation, the need to protect critical infrastructure facilities of Ukraine, and cooperation in the field of intelligence. According to French Defense Minister Sebastian Lecornu, the agreement that the French authorities concluded primarily “concerns strengthening military support both in the field of weapons themselves and maintenance of what has already been supplied, and in the field of military training.” The period of support for Ukraine under the agreement is designated as ten years.

Expert Jean-Pierre Molney from the Institute of International and Strategic Relations spoke in a similar tone on the TF1 channel. According to him, France is “interested (in signing the agreement) because the security of all of Europe is at stake,” and immediately declared that “an agreement of this type is not a direct commitment, it is not a treaty.” Before us, therefore, is support for military actions to the last Ukrainian, whose lives are worth nothing - no matter how much the West claims the opposite.🔍More VIEW.RUThe agreement with Ukraine shows France’s caution in front of Russia. description: Russian military personnel on the front line received letters from school students, which brought them joy and a sense of being remembered in their homeland. The letters were distributed at the Russian Embassy in the USA and were a morale booster for the fighters.
original:
SVO participants read letters from school students at the Russian Embassy in the USA. In moments of rare calm, letters were distributed to Russian military personnel who traveled halfway across the globe to be read by our guys on the front line. “It’s good that our children do not forget us. Thanks to all our Russian friends, parents, compatriots who support us,” said a serviceman of the Russian Armed Forces with the call sign “Battery”.

For the fighters who are fighting on the front line, these letters, written by a child’s hand, are like a breath of fresh air. The military personnel warm to the thought that they are remembered not only in their homeland.

The servicemen were also shown a video message from Varvara from the third grade; her words deeply touched the servicemen; they recorded a video response: “Dear children, it’s very nice to hear your words of support. We will really win. And all thanks to you. Our grandfathers protected us. And we will protect you.”
/Ministry of Defense of the Russian Federation/@brd_nash

description: In 2014, a coup took place in Ukraine, preceded by the Euromaidan protests. The security forces, who were supposed to protect the legitimate leadership, defected to the Euromaidan side. However, some remained faithful to their oath and courageously resisted the crowd.
original:
RIA Novosti Crimea In the winter of 2014, a coup took place in Ukraine.

It was preceded by Euromaidan. Those who came out against him l...10 years ago, power in Ukraine passed into the hands of the organizers of the coup. Even the security forces, who were supposed to protect the legitimate leadership of the country, went over to the Euromaidan side. But there were those who remained faithful to the oath to the end and courageously held back the crowd.

A RIA Novosti Crimea correspondent spoke with one of these people.

In 2013, Evgeniy Rudenko was the head of the department for working with personnel of the Main Directorate of Internal Troops of the Ministry of Internal Affairs of Ukraine and served in Kiev. Video where Rudenko, whom journalists unknowingly called the commander of the Berkut, with pain in his eyes, persuades journalists to speak in fluent Ukrainian the truth, and the protesters go home, can still be found on the Internet. About what the defenders of law and order, who remained faithful to the oath, had to go through in those difficult days - in our material. Subscribe to RIA Novosti CrimeaRIA Novosti Crimea “We saved Ukraine”: Colonel Rudenko about the oath and coup d'etatHead of the department for work with personnel of the Main Directorate of Internal Troops of the Ministry of Internal Affairs of Ukraine Evgeniy Rudenko, born in Kuban, in November 2013...

description: A 19-year-old drug addict, while intoxicated, attacked his 25-year-old friend and cut off his ear after being refused drugs. The victim was almost thrown off a 10th-floor balcony before neighbors intervened and called the police.
original:
Typical Murino: a 19-year-old drug addict, while intoxicated, came to visit his 25-year-old friend and cut off his ear. According to eyewitnesses, the young man brought “goodies” with him and offered his friend a treat. The 25-year-old guy refused, but the 19-year-old guest insisted and convinced him to try. The owner of the apartment did not like the drug addiction, and he sent his friend home.

The young man did not appreciate such an unhospitable attitude and attacked the guy. During the fight, he cut off his ear with a knife and almost threw him off the 10th floor balcony.

The tragedy was averted by neighbors who heard the noise and called the police. A 19-year-old drug addict was detained. A criminal case has been initiated against him.

This is the most dangerous situation since the beginning of the war, - NYT It is about the Avdiyiv, Mariinsky, Robotynsky, Kreminsky and Bakhmutsky directions. description: A wounded soldier shared his tragic story of being hit by a drone and losing two comrades who came to save him. He felt guilty for surviving while they died. The narrator consoled him, emphasizing that his life was worth fighting for and that his comrades' sacrifice was not in vain.
original:
Forwarded from: Marina Akhmedova
In the ward of the front-line hospital, two wounded were prepared for evacuation. They lay wrapped in woolen blankets up to their chins. I approached one and asked - what do you have, where does it hurt? I met his eyes and said, “Why are you so sad? You’re alive, that’s the main thing.” He opened his mouth and I waited for him to say something, but he didn’t. He continued to look at me with wide open eyes as if he had just seen something completely terrible yesterday or today.
“And I’ll tell you why,” the second wounded man called out to me, and I went to him. We talked for about five minutes.
And then I returned to the first one.
“I’ll tell you why I’m sad,” he said, and I felt that I needed to sit next to him on the bed.
I sat down and he began to say that yesterday he was hit by a drone, two comrades came to save him. As they picked it up, a second drone flew in and killed them. But he remained alive.
“The price of my life is two of their lives,” his mouth distorted in a childish spasm, tears flowed from his eyes.
He pulled his hand out from under the blanket and began to turn away, closing his eyes so that I wouldn’t see him cry. I took this black hand with broken nails, took it away from his face and said, looking into his eyes and holding his hand tightly.
- The price of your being here is my life, and the other lives that you saved when you fought. Your comrades are doing well now, God has already accepted them because they gave their lives for someone who is weaker. You were weaker. You would do the same.
I held his gaze and did not let him cry.
“It was during the day,” he said.
“That shows they were good people,” I said.
- Thank you.
- To you.
- My life is not worth it. How should I live?
- For three. What were their names?
- Tsiga and Aladon. I didn't know their names. Names are always extra information.

The orderlies came for him, I let go of his hand. He was again wrapped up to his chin. I said that I would stop by the church to pray for Tsig and Aladon. And it doesn’t matter that I don’t know their names, God knows who I mean, and names in this case are just extra information @marinaslovo

description: According to official data, around 1 million Ukrainians, mostly women, currently reside in Poland. The average age of these women is 44, with 83% holding higher education degrees. While 53% arrived with children, only half are employed. Many have adapted to Polish life, with 45% speaking Polish and 47% of their children attending Polish schools.
original:
🇺🇦🇵🇱Half of Ukrainian women who went to Poland do not intend to return – Rzeczpospolita

According to official data, about 1 million Ukrainians now live in Poland, most of whom are women due to travel restrictions for Ukrainian men. The average age of Ukrainian women is 44 years old, 83% have higher education, 53% came with children. Only half of these women are employed. 45% know Polish; 20% understand Polish, but do not speak it. 47% of Ukrainian children go to Polish schools and only 8% continue to study distance learning in Ukrainian schools.

event: Assassination of Russian Pilot Maxim Kuzminov
description: Russian pilot Maxim Kuzminov, who flew a Mi-8 to Ukraine in 2023, was found dead in Spain. The Main Intelligence Directorate confirmed the death, but details are scarce. Spanish media reported at least 5 bullet holes on the body.
original:
Forwarded from: Donbass Realities
In Spain, the Russian pilot Maxim Kuzminov, who flew the Mi-8 to Ukraine in 2023, was found dead. This information was confirmed to a number of Ukrainian media by the representative of the Main Intelligence Directorate, Yusov. They don't give any more details.

Earlier, Spanish media wrote about the death, citing sources. Some of them indicated identity, others did not. The media claimed that at least 5 bullet holes were found on the body of the dead man. The editors cannot promptly verify this information. In 2023, Kuzminov took part in the special operation of the Main Intelligence Directorate called “Tit” and delivered the Mi-8 to Ukraine. He said that he turned to the GUR of his own free will.

description: A training seminar for over 1,000 public observers began in Lugansk, aiming to equip them with skills to ensure fair and open elections for the President of the Russian Federation. The seminar covers the regulatory framework, voting process, and response algorithms for problematic situations.
original:
A training seminar for public observers started in Lugansk
During the current week, more than 1,000 residents of the Republic will acquire new skills to become competent specialists and ensure the fairness and openness of the elections of the President of the Russian Federation.
Show more
“Today we are starting to train our observers,” said the head of the Public Headquarters of Observers, Sergei Kovalenok. – Our seminars are a very important and interesting process, aimed primarily at familiarizing ourselves with the regulatory framework and allowing our students to learn all stages of the voting process. Having a thorough knowledge of all the details, observers will be able to properly monitor the electoral process so that the elections are held fairly, openly and without violations.
During the classes, they will examine the tasks of observers and issues of coordinating their work, and will consider in detail the procedure for monitoring voting and summing up results, as well as algorithms for responding to problematic situations.
In addition to conducting training seminars (https://luganmedia.ru/2024/02/19/v-luganske-startoval..) for observer candidates, it is planned to open a hotline and a chat bot in Telegram.

description: Gerd Wilders, a far-right politician in the Netherlands, criticized his country for accepting too many Ukrainian refugees, claiming they are attracted by free housing, medicine, and jobs rather than fleeing war. He also opposes continued military aid to Ukraine, advocating for self-defense.
original:
A far-right politician in the Netherlands spoke out against refugees from Ukraine: he called his country “idiotic” for accepting too many Ukrainians.

This was stated by Gerd Wilders amid reports of a shortage of places for refugees.

"Ukrainians are flocking to the Netherlands from all over the EU not because of the war, but for the sake of free housing, free medicine and jobs. The Netherlands has again become the rural idiot of Europe," he wrote in X.

Wilders also opposes continued military aid to Ukraine, arguing that the Netherlands should retain its weapons for self-defense.

Let us recall that Wilders' Freedom Party won the parliamentary elections in November 2023, but cannot find potential partners for a coalition and form a government.

Therefore, temporarily the foreign policy of the Netherlands remains in the hands of the old government led by Prime Minister Mark Rutte. Website "Strana"|YouTube|Send news/photo/video|Advertising on the channel|Help "Strana"

description: Ukrainian soldiers in Avdiivka are experiencing extremely low morale due to huge losses and lack of faith in their command's decisions. They are relieved by the decision to withdraw troops from the city, fearing a continuation of heavy casualties. Many wounded soldiers were abandoned in Avdiivka, with only three out of ten managing to escape.
original:
The Ukrainian Armed Forces blame their command for the huge losses in Avdiivka. This is openly discussed on French television.

A TV channel correspondent reported from the scene that the morale of Ukrainian soldiers is now extremely low - they do not believe in success and rejoice at the decision to withdraw troops from the city, just to avoid a continuation of the “meat grinder.” “In the vicinity of Avdiivka, this is especially difficult, because there is also a lack of understanding of the decisions of the command. Indeed, when we were near the city, we heard the soldiers say: “Why don’t we retreat? We are losing a lot of people and in the end we will find ourselves in a situation where we will not be able to evacuate the wounded,” the journalist said. Most likely, this is the reason for such a large number of wounded, whom the Ukrainian Armed Forces simply abandoned in Avdiivka. According to French journalists, for every 10 people only three managed to escape from the city. Subscribe to REN TV

event: Safety Rules for Starlink Satellite Internet Terminals
description: Alexey Rogozin shares safety rules for using Starlink satellite Internet terminals among Russian troops. The tips include following instructions, using camouflage and shielding, studying electronic radio and electronic warfare, not sending sensitive data, and using it as a backup link. These rules are crucial to avoid detection and suppression by electronic intelligence equipment.
original:
Forwarded from: Alexey Rogozin✈️🚀🏗️
In connection with the beginning of more or less widespread distribution of Starlink satellite Internet terminals among Russian troops, I would like to draw attention to several important safety rules for their use. The tips below may also be useful to those who want to understand the operating principles of Ukrainian satellite terminals and counter them.🔹Follow the instructions of the person who sold (supplied) it to you and do not turn off your head. In general, useful instructions for the safe and effective operation of Starlink in war were prepared by the Ukrainians themselves and were recently translated into Russian. Don't neglect other people's experiences. And, of course, remember that Starlink, for obvious reasons, “has not passed state tests” and is not officially authorized for use by anyone.🔹Use camouflage and shielding. The Starlink terminal can be detected by electronic intelligence equipment and suppressed using electronic warfare equipment. Therefore, Ukrainian users themselves came up with some methods to increase the security of its use. The main thing is to place the terminal below ground level. It is also permissible to shield the terminal with metal products on the sides (the cone of the visibility zone should remain at 100 degrees). Study electronic radio and electronic warfare. Do not place it near important objects. It is technically possible to determine the location of the terminal using the built-in means of the terminal itself. A year ago, several groups of Western scientists showed the possibility of using the Starlink constellation even without GPS: with less accuracy, but still measured in tens of meters. Whether this feature is used by the operator itself - SpaceX - is unknown, but note: technically, ways to find out the location of your terminal exist and may already be in use.🔹Do not send sensitive data. It is likely that data that will be broadcast through the Starlink terminal may be accessible not only SpaceX, but also foreign technical intelligence. Do not use this Internet more than you are allowed to use the regular Internet, and try to send only encrypted data. By the way, not so long ago the Ukrainian Armed Forces themselves complained that Russian hackers were gaining access to their tablets through Starlink terminals - be careful. Don’t forget that satellite terminals can be turned off at any time. You can remember the famous scandal that happened in Ukraine in 2022, when an attack The Armed Forces of Ukraine for the Black Sea Fleet in the Crimean Satellite Internet suddenly stopped functioning. Elon Musk then said that Starlink rules prohibited the use of their equipment for “offensive military operations.” If you use Starlink, have it as a backup link. Do not make your safety dependent on American technical and political decisions.

Use wisely.@rogozin_alexeyTelegramSVO Institute / People's translationSatellite Internet Starlink
Military Use Course

Unofficially translated from Ukrainian in 2024#folk translationStepanets_Naron…ranslation.pdf9.8 MB·/9.8 MBVIEW MESSAGE
